channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Car left abandoned on the road., 14th August
item.description:
Can has been left for several days in the road. I have witnessed many near miss accidents because it's been left in the lane. It's causing an obstruction to all incoming traffic and is left in the middle of a lane which is busy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hayes Lane, Hayes, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Absolute mess of lime bikes including bikes being dumped in non designated space, 14th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Balham Hill, Balham, London

item.title: Car Crashed into Bus Stop Blocking pavement - Dangerous, 14th August
item.description:
Croydon Road in Penge near jctn with Padua Rd - Car crashed into bus stop blocking pavement for a number of days. Previous report apparently dismissed as "a police matter". Pavement completely blocked causing pedestrians to walk in busy road. Please find some way to resolve and make safe. Thanks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 61-63, Croydon Road, Anerley, London

item.title: Abandoned car?, 14th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Speldhurst Close, Hayes, London
